content: पारीण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [पारं गच्छति, पार-खञ्] {@--1@} Being on or going over to the other or opposite side. {@--2@} (At the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) Thoroughly versed in, well acquainted with; त्रिवर्गपारीणमसौ भवंतभध्यासयन्नासनमेकमिंद्रः <ls>Bk. 2. 46.</ls> {@--3@} Fulfilling, completing, accomplishing.
